Package org.apache.drill.exec.metastore.analyze

Class FileMetadataInfoCollector

java.lang.Object
org.apache.drill.exec.metastore.analyze.FileMetadataInfoCollector
All Implemented Interfaces:
MetadataInfoCollector
public class FileMetadataInfoCollector extends Object implements MetadataInfoCollector
Implementation of MetadataInfoCollector for file-based tables.

      public static List<org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus> getFileStatuses(FileSelection fileSelection, DrillFileSystem fs) throws IOException
      Returns list of FileStatus file statuses obtained from specified FileSelection file selection. Specified file selection may be expanded fully if it wasn't expanded before.

      fs - file system
      Returns:
